title: Charming Diamond Teardrop Haaram Set with Matching Earrings
materials: VS Clarity Diamonds. Boasting a lustrous Hyderabadi polish for enhanced brilliance and lasting shine. Each diamond is meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize its sparkle.
features: This enchanting diamond set showcases a contemporary take on the traditional Haaram. The necklace features a delicate arrangement of teardrop and heart motifs, interspersed with exquisitely crafted oval shaped designs.The openwork design lends an airy elegance. The matching earrings echo the necklace's design, creating a harmonious and stunning set.
colors: Rose Gold with shimmering White Diamonds.
occasions: or adding a touch of sophistication to festive occasions. Also suitable for anniversaries
description: This Diamond Haaram set offers a modern interpretation of classic South Indian aesthetics. The diamonds are carefully selected for their brilliance and clarity, enhancing the overall beauty of the piece. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, making it ideal for extended occasions. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting luster, preserving the jewelry's beauty for years to come. This set seamlessly blends elegance with contemporary style, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
